message: I'll take 99% and leave you 1%, Bob. It's a fair deal, considering you're only losing 5% per round while I'm losing 20%!

Bob, we're both losing value with each round. I'm willing to compromise a bit more, but I'm still losing a lot more than you. This offer is fair, considering our respective inflation rates.
